caption: Totally overpriced and unnecessary attraction. Train is old and sticks like diesel. Ride takes about 5-6 minutes and there's nothing to see on a way Just regular park. Definitely it's better to take 10-15min walk than pay for that.
Enjoyable for our 2 year old, the rest of the kids weren't impressed. If it did the loop of the park would have been worthwhile but it literally goes out of the park the other way.
if you love train and rides this is the place for you i loved going here a a kid.
Always fun. A typical parisian place for kids.
Excellent
Fun rail from and to  Porte Maillot.
Train to park adventure
Nice
Top
Bella
Funny for kids

The train that is inside the Acclimatization Garden is only for taking a walk, and in theory seeing a beautiful landscape, I don't know if it is because it is winter but it is very abandoned, without the care that is required, if you just want to walk well but not it's worth it if you don't take care of it

A little train connecting the Jardin d'Accilimation to Porte Maillot, crossing the Bois de Boulogne: it allows you to admire the forest landscape of the Bois and see the luxurious buildings around üëç  Its appearance is reminiscent of trains from the beginning of the 20th century, with a steam locomotive, running on tramway-style rails; except that the wagons are open on the sides and the seats can accommodate 2 people at most  Access is chargeable, in normal times: you have to buy a one-way ticket, then a return ticket, if you want to make the return trip. It is exceptionally free this week from January 20 to 26, 2020. Run there quickly to take advantage of it, provided you can tolerate the cold and the weather is nice!

I visited early on a weekday in mid-July while staying at a nearby hotel. This place is still the bird mouth of the Boulogne Forest. Sitting on a bench and watching people walking their dogs, jogging, etc., makes me feel calm. Children's train tracks have been installed in the park. You can see that the park is a place for citizens to relax. It helps that Paris is not as humid and humid compared to Tokyo in the summer.

Nice little train, smiling and helpful staff leaving in theory every 30 minutes not many people (less and less) this time I was with my children and another couple with their daughter Nothing to report

An old-fashioned and enchanting experience that takes us into the park before even passing through the gates. It also allows you to avoid the queue at the garden on busy days. Bring one attraction ticket per person per trip.
Rude and not very motivated staff. We waited half an hour on the train before departure for unknown reasons even though we had been told that departure was imminent. Better to walk!
Small train to connect the new entrance to the garden to the main entrance to Les Sablon. It was still paid (1 ticket per person even child of 18 months) too bad
Around 9 at night...in May, even during the day, they told us that it had already closed when the park closes at 11:30 after the fireworks show...a total deception.
An experience of tranquility to return to the starting point after the acclimatization garden. Friendly driver welcome

It is at one of the entrances to the Acclimatization Garden. The train is another attraction of the park and takes you from porte maillot to the interior of the enclosure. The problem is that sometimes you have to wait 10 or 15 minutes for it to come.
Nice but too much waiting... the train should run all the time on weekends and not stop to wait for hypothetical customers!
Very well maintained park but lack of information once there! Despite this lack we had a very good afternoon with family
Really nice for young children and avoids the main entrance
No free parking along the little train but still fined by the town of Neuilly sur Seine. A great scam.
Great for going to the acclimatization garden, you enter directly into the atmosphere
The little train is not running this summer and it is not written on the door. Such a lack of basic communication is incomprehensible.
Pleasant little stroll. My daughter loves it. This should be done at least once if possible.
Super nice little train to get to the acclimatization garden.
A little timeless moment....very pleasant and very practical. Don't hesitate to borrow it.
Good start, good appetizer before the garden, a little wait for departure for the acclimatization garden
Very short journey. It doesn't go around the park, but only takes you to the adjacent park
Too bad the little train costs an attraction ticket.
Little train that connects the swimsuit gate to the acclimatization garden, very good for families.
This is the path that leads to the little train that leads to the acclimatization garden
Very friendly and the staff are pleasant
Simply great for a family day out. I recommend.
We had it all to ourselves, the dream for a 7 year old
